sense.def:
To reverse a process, decision, or policy
pomeni spremeniti potek dogajanja, odločitev ali ukrepe v njim nasprotne.

seg.quote: The farmers want to see this trend reversed.
The party reversed its decision and agreed to the change.

sense.def:
To reverse the order of a set of things
pomeni, da skupino stvari, ki so v določenem redu, razvrstimo tako, da prvi predmet postane zadnji.

To reverse the positions or functions of two things
pomeni medsebojno zamenjati položaj ali funkcijo dveh predmetov.

seg.quote: In this play the traditional sex roles are reversed.

sense.def:
To reverse a car
pomeni voziti avto nazaj.

seg.quote: The street was so narrow that cars which entered it had to reverse out again.

sense.def:
Kadar je avto
in reverse
, je prestava v vzvratnem položaju, tako da lahko vozimo nazaj.

seg.quote: I threw the truck into reverse.

sense.def:
Izraz
reverse
pomeni nasproten od pravkar opisanega.

seg.quote: In the past ten years I think we've seen the reverse process.

sense.def:
The reverse
je nasprotje od pravkar opisanega.

seg.quote: You may think we have been making a profit. In fact the reverse is true.

sense.def:
To reverse the charges
pomeni telefonirati tako, da stroške pogovora plača oseba, ki jo kličemo;
